title: Godlovesyou
author: Godlovesyou
content: If you really want to survive in a country like Nigeria, don't try to carry any government matter for your head because even them, themselves do not want you to have pity on them or the country.Naija nah the only place weh if you vote for person, you yourself cannot say where your vote goes to. Not to get heart attack just focus on your hustles and daily bread pursuing to live long. If any good come your way you chop be happy with family and love ones. No go kill yourself

comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: please lock the topic........ Election related matters should be discus here.... https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5444110.0 and please put effort into your topic, enough of the election discussions, this is a bitcoin forum. there is a dedicated board for politics and society. make we dey help ourselves.

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: We are trying our best to face our work and leave the government to govern the country the way they want, but the problem is that they don't allow us to face our work anymore,in sense that they came to us and problem us heaven and earth that it is going to be totally different this time around,and try to decieve us and when we eventually come out to make a positive change in our country and after the election they now selection..

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: I think this matta don do for us because we country no be wetin we go put too much eyes than focusing and cleaning away anything politics from this group because if you check this out board out of 50 to 60 percent topics are basically on election and government matter so I suggest we should leave them to be at this moment. Just as @Igebotz already said.

comments.author: Alphakilo
comments.body: If u wan survive for naija just forget our leaders and focus on your hustle. If you begin look up to our leaders for survival you are just wasting your time. The only people wey fit manage depend on out leaders na people wey dey do government work.If you dey hustle your way out just no depend on our leaders because they have failed us.

comments.author: martyns
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomiles1 on March 26, 2023, 10:08:04 PMI think this matta don do for us because we country no be wetin we go put too much eyes than focusing and cleaning away anything politics from this group because if you check this out board out of 50 to 60 percent topics are basically on election and government matter so I suggest we should leave them to be at this moment. Just as @Igebotz already said.lol,,,the reason why we finam hard to forget be say politics belongs to everybody,and we dey talkam base on say na sometin wey concern everybody,,,if we no talk something aboutam,,then e neva complete.them dey Callam government of the people,for the people,and by the people,that is to say na still we go make the government,without us,e no go fit function.Our people dey say" wetin dey person teeth,the tongue no dey gree leavam.Government na wetin we no go fit leave to talk aboutam no matter how we try,because them go definitely still do something wey go either hurt us or please us. It is upto us to either choose to talk good about,or to talk bad about we government.
